concept-wr.title: Selecting Virtual Machine Flavors
concept-wr.shortdesc: Flavors are created by the system administrator.

conbody.p: A flavor is a list of attributes applied to a virtual machine when a new instance is created. It specifies resources to be allocated by the system, such as size of RAM, number of cores, storageresources, and so on.
Existing flavors can be selected by tenant users.
